info.name: CNC70-NB-API
info.description: This postman collection provides the API requests and examples for the North Bound API supported by the CNC-CAT Application. Any OSS integration can use these APIs.All these APIs are accessible via Crossword API Gateway in the CNC CAT Application. Thee JWT Token authentication is required to access these APIs.

item.name: CW Authentication

request.description: this is the first step in getting the JWT token for API authentication to get the TGT ticket which will be used in step2
this is the second and final step to get the JWT token for API authentication. The JWT token obtained with this API will be used as a bearer token in the authentication header in API calls.

item.description:
two requests have to be made to get the JWT token (bearer) required for any crosswork API access via API Gateway (Tyk)

To get the JWT token

1. change the collection level variables for the host, port, user and password for a specific target crosswork server.
2. invoke a step1 request to get the ticket
3. invoke the step2 request to get the jwt token which needs the ticket (stored in a variable) obtained in step 1
